definition: Acre, city in Israel, also known as Akko
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

pinyin: A1 ka3 di2 ya4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: Academy gradually became the commonly accepted name for societies of this kind.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡德米成为这类团体的共称。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a chewing tablet taking acarbose as an active component.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种以阿卡波糖为活性成份的咀嚼片。

sentences.english: Looking through the Akashic records is like leafing through an infinite mental photo album.
sentences.chinese: 察看阿卡西记录就像翻阅一本无限的精神相册一样。

sentences.english: Akazi pluton, which occurs in Western Kunlun in north of Qinghai-Tibet plateau, is the known oldest pluton in this area.
sentences.chinese: 西昆仑山阿卡孜岩体是该区已知的最古老侵入体。

sentences.english: Akasha is one of the many souls claimed by the blade, Frostmourne.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡莎是死于叹霜之剑下的无数亡魂之一。

sentences.english: Running as fast as his legs could carry him, Actaeon was soon out of breath .
sentences.chinese: 阿卡同拼命狂奔，很快就上气不接下气。

sentences.english: Metformin and acarbose more often cause diarrhea and other digestive problems than the others.
sentences.chinese: 二甲双胍和阿卡波糖多引起腹泻和其他消化道疾病。

sentences.english: Nowadays Assyrian is considered a dialect of Akkadian .
sentences.chinese: 今天的亚述语被认为是阿卡得语的方言。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of combination therapy of insulin and acarbose on glucose excursion in diabetic patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察胰岛素治疗联合阿卡波糖对血糖波动的影响。

sentences.english: But learning in the classroom is only part of the world of education at Acadia .
sentences.chinese: 但是课堂上的学习只是在阿卡迪亚学习的一部分。

sentences.english: The hiring manager is more likely to be flexible, says Mr. Akana.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡纳表示，直接上司通常都更容易变通。

sentences.english: Conclusions Acarbose is effective and comparatively safe to the elderly with postprandial hypotension.
sentences.chinese: 结论阿卡波糖治疗老年人餐后低血压安全有效。

sentences.english: Acadia is the only national Park in the northeastern United States.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡迪亚公园是美国东北部仅有的一个国家公园。

sentences.english: Thunder Hole is a must-see in Maine's Acadia National Park.
sentences.chinese: 雷鸣洞是在缅因州的阿卡迪亚国家公园必须看的景点。

sentences.english: Arius: That man is going to bring the ARCANA shortly.
sentences.chinese: 那男人很快就要将阿卡那祭器带来。

sentences.english: Matier: It seemed that you obtained the final ARCANA.
sentences.chinese: 看来你找到最后的阿卡那祭器了。

definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
